body: I saw `ExpandEnvironmentStrings` is used [here](http://src.chromium.org/svn/trunk/src/base/registry.cc) for Desktop. How do I do it in Windows Mobile? The data type looks [valid in Windows Mobile](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa912205.aspx)
title: How to expand REG_EXPAND_SZ in Windows Mobile?
